tachyon.metrics

Class MetricsSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.metrics.MetricsSystem

  • public class MetricsSystem
extends Object
    A MetricsSystem is created by a specific instance(master, worker). It polls the metrics sources periodically and pass the data to the sinks. The syntax of the metrics configuration file is: [instance].[sink|source].[name].[options]=[value]

    • Method Detail

      • getSinks

        public List<Sink> getSinks()
        Gets the sinks.
        Returns:
        a list of registered Sinks

      • getSources

        public List<Source> getSources()
        Gets the sources. Used by unit tests only.
        Returns:
        a list of registered Sources

      • checkMinimalPollingPeriod

        public static void checkMinimalPollingPeriod(TimeUnit pollUnit,
                                             int pollPeriod)
                                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if the poll period is smaller that the minimal poll period which is 1 second.
        Parameters:
        pollUnit - the polling unit
        pollPeriod - the polling period
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the polling period is invalid

      • getServletHandler

        public org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletContextHandler getServletHandler()
        Gets the ServletContextHandler of the metrics servlet.
        Returns:
        the ServletContextHandler if the metrics system is running and the metrics servlet exists, otherwise null
